remarks: A morphism of non-unital rings is a function. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by AV, 27-Feb-2020.)
statement:
rngcbasOLD.c $e |- C = ( RngCatOLD ` U ) $.
rngcbasOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
rngcbasOLD.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
rngchomfvalOLD.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
rngchomOLD.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
rngchomOLD.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
elrngchomOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( F e. ( X H Y ) -> F : ( Base ` X ) --> ( Base ` Y ) ) ) $.
